title: WashU Expert: Senate criminal justice reform bill falls short of needed changes (Washington University in ...
text: ( Source : Washington University in Saint Louis ) A bipartisan groups of United States senators announced Oct. 1 legislation that would overhaul the country's criminal justice system, giving judges more leeway in sentencing and reducing
